raw: About the 20% off: Valid July 6–10, 2018 in US stores and at dsw.com for 20% off your entire order. Use offer code YAYDAYS to redeem online. Limit 1 per customer. Not valid toward gift cards, past purchases, shipping, or tax. No cash back. Cannot be replaced if lost, stolen, or damaged. Value can be reused on same-day exchange only. Exclusions apply. See store or dsw.com for details. Additional details: May be combined with up to two Rewards and one offer. Excludes Birkenstock, Brooks, Keen, Rainbow, Sorel, and UGG products, plus select Nike, Converse and Under Armour styles. Not valid at any DSW Canada store or at www.dswcanada.ca. Associates of DSW and of other companies owned by DSW, Inc., are not eligible for offer. For help, contact shoephoria! Center: 1.866.DSW.SHOES or customerservice@dsw.com.

*Up to 70% off is for a limited time only, on selected lines only. Excludes certain brands, delivery charges, gift vouchers and subscription to ASOS Premier Delivery. Prices marked down on site. While stocks last.

A discount of 30% of the product net sale price will be deducted when one or more qualifying products are purchased. Either click through a promo link or enter the promo code TAKE30OFZAZZ (i) to reflect the discounted price on each product page and/or (ii) during checkout to receive the offer. All discounts are valid through 7/10/2018 11:59:59 PM PDT. For most products, the net sale price is the price of the product (excluding shipping and taxes). This offer only applies to qualifying products marked

This offer excludes embroidery digitization, screen-printed apparel, fabric, gift cards, Zazzle Heart products, products made by Apliiq, Beltcraft, Big Shot Bikes, Bound Journals, Distinctive Suspenders (Sartorous LLC), Foxy Originals, Good Wood NYC, ScarfMaker, Way Basics, White Faux Taxidermy, and Yellowleaf Hammocks. This offer excludes products from the stores listed here: https://www.zazzle.com/store+exclusions. This offer may not be combined with any other Zazzle promotional or volume discount offers and may not be applied to past purchases. If a volume discount applies to your order, you will receive either the discount set forth in this offer or the standard volume discount, whichever is greater. Offer valid on Zazzle.com only. Zazzle reserves the right to make changes to or terminate this offer at any time.
Valid on one local or one getaway flashdeal. Max 3 uses per customer. Use code SAVE.

*Receive either: 10% off your order of $50, or receive 15% off your order of $100 or more, or receive 20% off your order of regular price purchase of $150 at forever21.com from July 8, 2018 at 12:00am through July 13, 2018 at 11:59pm. Offer valid on regular price items only. Offer not valid in-store. To redeem 10% off offer online, enter code SAVE10 at checkout. To redeem 15% off offer online, enter code SAVE15 at checkout. To redeem 20% off offer online, enter code SAVE20 at checkout. Minimum purchase amount must be met in a single transaction before taxes. Offer cannot be combined with any other promotion, offer, or discount. Not valid on the purchase of gift cards or e-gift cards, non-Forever 21 branded items, Red Deals, or shipping and handling charges. No adjustments on previous purchases. Not redeemable for cash or cash equivalent. Nothing stated herein will affect customer’s legal rights. Forever 21 reserves the right to modify or cancel this promotion at any time without notice.

Valid now through August 11, 2018 at 11:59pm ET. In-store coupon or online promo code may only be used once and cannot be combined with any other coupons or storewide offers.  Not Valid on Jeans. Not valid on Featured Brands, MLB merchandise, Insta Sale items, clearance or previous purchases. Other restrictions may apply. See store or express.com for details. Minimum purchase requirement amount is net of any discounts. Sales tax, gift boxes, and shipping and handling are not included in the total minimum purchase calculation. Taxes payable after coupon value is deducted. Coupon must be presented and surrendered at the time of purchase. If you return a portion of your purchase a portion of the discount will be lost. Cannot be redeemed for cash or used to purchase Express Gift Cards. Reproductions of coupon will not be accepted. Valid at Express and Express Men stores only in the U.S. and online at express.com. Not valid at Express Factory Outlet stores.

*10% OFF + FREE SHIPPING: Offer valid through 7/10/2018 on all orders. To redeem in-store, print or show this email on your smartphone. To redeem online, use code 3137 when placing your order to redeem the discount and free shipping (5-7 business days). Cannot be combined with any other offer, discount, sale items, already reduced items, guest designer collaborations or select special collections. Cannot be used for Gift Card purchase or shipping. No adjustments on prior purchases. May not be redeemed for cash or cash equivalent and is not transferable. Valid in the US only.
Details: 25% off art prints, framed prints, canvas prints, metal prints, tapestries, posters, wood wall art, wall murals and wall hangings.

About the 5X points: Get 5X points on every purchase made in US stores and at dsw.com July 27–29, 2018. Use offer code 5XVIP to redeem online. Show barcode in store. Cannot be combined with other bonus points events. Allow 2–3 weeks for points to post. Limit 1 per customer. Not valid toward gift cards, past purchases, shipping, or tax. No cash back. Cannot be replaced if lost, stolen, or damaged. Exclusions apply. See store or dsw.com for details.

*Receive 15% off your purchase of regular price items and Free Standard Shipping with minimum regular price purchase of $15 at forever21.com only from July 26, 2018 at 12:00am through July 27, 2018 at 11:59pm. Eligible customers must enter THANKSIG15 checkout with regular price items and select standard shipping with more than $15 of regular price items in your cart during checkout in order to receive free shipping. Offer cannot be combined with any other promotion, offer, or discount. Not valid on the purchase of gift cards or e-gift cards, non-Forever 21 branded items, Core Basics, Red Deals, taxes, shipping and handling charges, discounted, promotional, or sale items. No adjustments on previous purchases. Not redeemable for cash or cash equivalent. Nothing stated herein will affect customer’s legal rights. Forever 21 reserves the right to modify or cancel this promotion at any time without notice.

*Receive an extra 40% off your online purchase of sale clearance items [(pick one or both)] from from July 30, 2018 through August 6, 2018 at forever21.com only. To redeem, enter EXTRA40 at checkout. Sale and clearance merchandise are all FINAL SALE and cannot be returned or exchanged. Offer cannot be combined with any other promotion, offer or discount. Not valid on the purchase of gift cards or e-gift cards, non-Forever 21 branded items, Core Basics, Red Deals, taxes, shipping and handling charges, discounted, promotional items. No adjustments on previous purchases. Offer is not transferable and not valid for cash or cash equivalent. Nothing stated herein will affect customers' legal rights. Forever 21 reserves the right to modify or cancel this promotion at any time without notice.
Today Only - 20% off sitewide. Use code: LEGEND

About the $10, $20, or $60 off: Valid August 23-28, 2018 in US stores and at dsw.com for $10 off a purchase of $49, $20 off a purchase of $99, or $60 off a purchase of $199. Use offer code FEELINGFALL to redeem online. Limit 1 per customer. Not valid toward gift cards, past purchases, shipping, or tax. No cash back. Cannot be replaced if lost, stolen, or damaged. Value can be reused on sameday exchange only. Exclusions apply. See store or dsw.com for details.

About the Free Movie Tickets: **Reward is available with a purchase of $39.00 USD or more, before taxes and after coupons/discounts, from a participating DSW store location in the contiguous U.S. between August 21-28, 2018 while supplies last. Purchase must be made in a single transaction. Customer must receive a voucher with a Unique Code from a store associate in order to participate. Applications must be submitted within 14 days of purchase as indicated on the receipt. Certain restrictions apply. Reward is defined as a Movie Certificate, good for two (2) movie tickets, up to a $30.00 USD total value, to see any movie at participating theatres. No credit or refund provided for any unused portion of the reward. Internet access and printer required. Payment will be required for tickets exceeding $30.00 USD. Reward Codes will expire on 2/28/19. Movie Certificates expire two (2) months after online Reward Code activation. Reward is subject to availability while supplies last. Reward is subject to full terms and conditions, available at www.activaterewards.com/hmm/terms. Must be 18+. Not valid at any DSW Canada store or at www.dswcanada.ca. Associates of DSW and of other companies owned by DSW, Inc., are not eligible for offer. Limit one (1) Reward per Customer name, per Customer email address, and per Customer household. Reward is non-transferable. See www.reward-now.com/dswviprewards for complete details.

40% OFF EVERYTHING. Valid August 30, 2018 at 12:00 AM ET through September 4, 2018 until 2:59 AM ET. Offer cannot be combined with any other promotions or offers. Not valid on Featured Brands, MLB merchandise, clearance items or previous purchases. Other restrictions may apply. See store or express.com for details. Taxes payable after discount is deducted. Cannot be used to purchase Express Gift Cards. Valid at Express and Express Men stores in the U.S. and at express.com.

*Offer valid for Rouge members on merchandise purchases made from 12:01am PT on 8/24/18 through 11:59pm PT on 9/3/18 and for both VIB and Insider members from 12:01am PT on 8/30/18 through 11:59pm PT on 9/3/18 in Sephora US stores, Sephora Canada stores, Sephora inside JCPenney stores, and online. Offer not valid on jcp.com. Online offer valid for one-time use only; in-store offer may be redeemed multiple times. Not valid on purchases of customizable sets online or through Sephora’s customer service. Clients are limited to the purchase of three Drunk Elephant items per SKU per transaction and three Tatcha items per SKU per transaction. Not valid on Dyson, previous purchases, purchases of gift cards, FLASH, PLAY! by Sephora, gift wrapping, packaging, taxes, or shipping & handling charges. Return of discounted merchandise will be for the price actually paid. Sephora is not responsible for damaged, lost, or stolen promotion codes or barcodes. Promotion offer has no cash value and may not be altered, sold, or transferred. Relevant Beauty Insider status must be attained prior to redemption. No minimum purchase required. Due to heavy demand, Sephora FLASH delivery times cannot be guaranteed for this promotion. Not valid on orders shipping outside the US or Canada. Cannot be used in conjunction with other promotion codes. Sephora and JCPenney employees are not eligible for this offer. Offer is subject to change, alteration, or termination by Sephora at its sole discretion at any time.

About the 2X points: Get 2X points on every purchase made in US stores and at dsw.com August 30–September 3, 2018. No code needed to redeem online. Show barcode to redeem in store. Cannot be combined with other bonus points events. Allow 2–3 weeks for points to post. Limit 1 per customer. One-time use. Not valid toward gift cards, past purchases, shipping, or tax. No cash back. Cannot be replaced if lost, stolen, or damaged. Exclusions apply. See store or dsw.com for details.
Labor Day Sale. 15% off 75$. Use code DAYOFF at checkout.

$15 Off $150 Reorder: Valid on prescription contact lenses orders of $150 or more. May not be combined with other offers, discount, or promotions. DiscountContactLenses.com reserves the right to discontinue or modify this offer at any time.

*ONLINE & IN-STORE - 24 HRS ONLY! 30%/20%/10% OFF: Offer valid through 08/19/2018. To redeem in-store, print or show this banner on your smartphone. To redeem online, use code 3163 on orders of $200 or more to redeem 30% off your purchase + free shipping (5-7 business days). Use code 3162 on orders of $100 or more to redeem 20% off your purchase + free shipping (5-7 business days). Use code 3161 on orders of $50 or more to redeem 10% off your purchase + free shipping (5-7 business days). Cannot be combined with any other offer, discount, sale items, already reduced items, guest designer collaborations or select special collections. No adjustments on prior purchases. Not valid for purchase of gift cards or shipping. May not be redeemed for cash or cash equivalent and is not transferable. Valid in the US only.
